profileAlternative.name: Fernando Melchor
profileAlternative.headline: Data Scientist at Discovery Inc
profileAlternative.summary:
Highly motivated Data Scientist with solid data and geo-spatial analysis skills seeking to design innovative products and services. Energetic team player focused on delivering high quality work with strong impact. 6 years of proven record in strategic thinking in various areas including engineering and product development. I have special interest in geospatial analysis, natural language processing, recommender systems and network analysis techniques.

Passionate about cities and proficient at building professional relationships based on trust & respect, complemented by linguistic knowledge: (English, Spanish & French)
https://obsidian-mirror.net/
